name: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Modifier
desc: Values that describe how the framework handles different kinds of selection modifiers.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new navigation modifier using a raw value.

items.name: static var extend: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Modifier
items.desc: The value that indicates the framework extends the selection by not moving the initial location while in a drag selection.

items.name: static var multiple: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Modifier
items.desc: The value that indicates the framework extends the selection visually inside the rectangular area defined by the anchor and dragged positions.

items.name: static var visual: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Modifier
items.desc: The value that indicates the framework extends the selection visually inside the rectangular area defined by the anchor and drag positions.
